Player History
Traded from Los Angeles (N) to Philadelphia on 4/1/1965 (Going to LAN: CF A. Phillips, P W. Granger, P P. Edmondson, P J. James. Going to PHI: P S. Koufax, P P. Richert, SS M. Wills)...
Injured on 6/22/1965 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1965, winning 2 games with a 0.53 ERA...
Injured on 5/17/1966 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 9 weeks...
Injured on 4/20/1967 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1968 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/28/1970 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Philadelphia to Los Angeles on 1/31/1971 (Going to PHI: RF G. Foster, 1B J. Mayberry Sr., P J. Strohmayer. Going to LA: P P. Richert)...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1971...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Houston on 4/4/1972...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1975, winning 2 games with a 1.50 ERA...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1975, winning 2 games with a 1.50 ERA...
Injured on 7/29/1976 with a Spasms Back, out for 5 weeks...
Released by New York (N) on 8/8/1977...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 8/8/1977 to a 1-year deal worth $1,660,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/6/1978 to a 2-year deal worth $4,454,000 per year...
